description: A PHP web page that implements a password change interface, including form validation, user interactions, and client-side scripting for changing passwords within a web application.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Returns an instance number based on the current logged-in user, used for password change context.

methods.name: cancel_save
methods.description: Redirects the user to the 'at_a_glance.php' page, canceling the password change process.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to update the password configuration and handles success or failure responses.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates old and new passwords, then initiates the password change process.
